definition: dwarf lilyturf (Ophiopogon japonicus), its tuber used in TCM

sentences.english: FFM did not show obvious acute toxicity.
sentences.chinese: 复方麦冬丸没有明显的急性毒性。

sentences.english: FFM have not significant effect of immune system.
sentences.chinese: 复方麦冬丸对免疫系统没有明显影响。

sentences.english: Dry mouth can often Ophiopogon japonicus, such as Chinese medicine Shashen tea drinking.
sentences.chinese: 口腔干燥可经常用麦冬，沙参等中药泡茶饮用。

sentences.english: Radix ophiopogonis as medicine are expensive, volatile oils are the main active ingredient radix ophiopogonis.
sentences.chinese: 麦冬是名贵中药，挥发油是麦冬的主要活性成分。

sentences.english: Radix ophiopogonis as medicine are expensive, volatile oils are the main active ingredient radix ophiopogonis.
sentences.chinese: 麦冬是名贵中药，挥发油是麦冬的主要活性成分。

sentences.english: Objective:To provide a reference for further development and ulitization of polysaccharides in ophiopogon japonicus .
sentences.chinese: 目的为麦冬多糖的进一步开发和利用提供参考。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the mycorrhizal structure and its characteristics of Ophiopogon japonicus.
sentences.chinese: 目的从细胞学水平上研究麦冬的菌根结构特征。

sentences.english: Ophiopogon japonicus is an important nourishing-yin drug in the traditional Chinese herbs.
sentences.chinese: 麦冬作为一滋阴药，在传统中药行列中占有重要地位。

sentences.english: Ultrafiltration is a good method for the isolation and purification of Radix Liriopes Polysaccharide.
sentences.chinese: 超滤是一种很好的分离纯化山麦冬多糖的方法。

sentences.english: FFM have good eliminating phlegm effect.
sentences.chinese: 复方麦冬丸有较好的祛痰作用。

definition: dwarf lilyturf (Ophiopogon japonicus), its tuber used in TCM
